programme.desc: Coverage of day one at the All England Club, with all eyes on defending men's champion Novak Djokovic as he begins his campaign on Centre Court. Djokovic has beaten Roger Federer in the last two finals here and his victory in the French Open earlier this month not only meant that he completed a career Grand Slam, but that he also now holds all four major titles. Federer missed that tournament due to injury, but can never be discounted on the grass courts, although Rafael Nadal is one of the high-profile absentees as he continues recover from a problematic left wrist.(n)
